sentences.en: Aversion phenomena are shown by fungi other than basidiomycetes.
sentences.cn: 排斥现象除担子菌外也曾由其它真菌证实过.

sentences.en: Bacteria and fungi are other important soil organisms.
sentences.cn: 细菌和真菌是另一类重要的土壤有机体.

sentences.en: But without fungi we would not have gardens, houses or even feet at all.
sentences.cn: 但是，如果没有真菌，我们就不会有花园、住宅，甚至脚。

sentences.en: Conidia are the characteristic asexual reproductive units of fungi.
sentences.cn: 分生孢子是真菌的特征,无性繁殖的单位.

sentences.en: Earthworms may be instrumental in dispersing fungi or bacteria.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓可能是散布真菌及细菌的工具.

sentences.en: Ferns, mosses and fungi spread by means of spores.
sentences.cn: 蕨类植物、苔藓和真菌通过孢子传播蔓生。

sentences.en: Fungi have a way of turning nasty -- seeping into the bloodstream and invading vital organs.
sentences.cn: 真菌具有转变成十分令人憎恶的方式的能力 —— 渗入血流、侵入重要的器官.

sentences.en: In some fungi, there is evidence of incipient speciation.
sentences.cn: 在某些真菌中, 有新发生的物种形成的证据.
许多真菌可以无性繁殖。

sentences.en: Most, if not all fungi can dispense with inorganic sources.
sentences.cn: 即使不是全部亦是大多数真菌可省去无机氮源.

sentences.en: Mushrooms, toadstools and mildew are all fungi.
sentences.cn: 蘑菇 、 蕈与白霉都是菌类植物.

sentences.en: Some of those carbon products transfer from the roots to symbiotic fungi and soil microbes, which store the carbon in the soil as humus.
sentences.cn: 这些含碳化合物有部分从根部被共生真菌和土壤中的微生物摄取，最后变成腐殖质储存在土壤里。

sentences.en: The good news about fungi is that they are relatively stable.
sentences.cn: 对付真菌的好消息是,真菌相对稳定.

sentences.en: The impact of the fungi comes too late.
The lawn was covered with fungi.
The site had been inoculated with soil containing suitable mycorrhizal fungi.
sentences.cn: 在生境中用带有合适菌根真菌的土壤接种.

sentences.en: These fungi are septate with simple pores in their cross - walls.
sentences.cn: 这些真菌在它们的横壁中是具简单孔的横隔膜的.

sentences.en: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.cn: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。
